contentrichtext.text: {{Location map |China |label=Quyang | lat_deg=38 | lat_min=37 | lon_deg=114 | lon_min=41 |position=left |width=250 |float=right |caption=Quyang }} [[Image:Quyang 2.jpg|300 px|right|upright|A street in Quyang.]] '''Quyang County''' ({{zh|s=曲阳县|t=曲陽縣|p=Qūyáng Xiàn}})is under the administration of [[Baoding]] City, [[Hebei]], China.<ref name = "Admin Div">[http://www.xzqh.org/html/list/42.html 保定市-行政区划网 ]</ref> The county is famous for its stone carvings, many of which are exported abroad.<ref>http://www.reuters.com/article/lifestyleMolt/idUSTRE52P02420090326 Retrieved April 6th, 2009.</ref> The [[Beiyue Temple]] is located in Quyang city. ==Administrative Divisions<ref name = "Admin Div"/>== Towns: *[[Hengzhou, Quyang County|Hengzhou]] (恒州镇), [[Lingshan, Quyang County|Lingshan]] (灵山镇), [[Yanzhao]] (燕赵镇), [[Yangping, Quyang County|Yangping]] Townships: *[[Luzhuangzi Township]] (路庄子乡), [[Xiahe Township, Hebei|Xiahe Township]] (下河乡), [[Zhuangke Township]] (庄窠乡), [[Xiaomu Township]] (孝墓乡), [[Wende Township]] (文德乡), [[Dongwang Township, Hebei|Dongwang Township]] (东旺乡), [[Xiaolin Township]] (晓林乡), [[Dicun Township]] (邸村乡), [[Chande Township]] (产德乡), [[Qicun Township]] (齐村乡), [[Dangcheng Township]] (党城乡), [[Langjiazhuang Township]] (郎家庄乡), [[Fanjiazhuang Township]] (范家庄乡), [[Beitai Township]] (北台乡) {{coord|38|37|N|114|41|E|region:CN_type:city|display=title}} ==Notes== {{reflist}} {{Commons category|Quyang}} {{County-level divisions of Hebei}} [[Category:Baoding]] [[Category:County-level divisions of Hebei]] {{Baoding-geo-stub}}
